title: Linux flatpak Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Flatpak package management tool for Linux, learn how to install and manage Flatpak applications, and customize Flatpak environments for your specific needs.

meta.title: Linux flatpak Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Flatpak package management tool for Linux, learn how to install and manage Flatpak applications, and customize Flatpak environments for your specific needs.
meta.keywords: Linux, Flatpak, Package Management, Application Installation, Environment Customization

verify.name: Verify Flatpak installation
verify.hint: Ensure that Flatpak is installed and the Flathub remote is added correctly.

verify.name: Verify GIMP Flatpak installation
verify.hint: Ensure that the GIMP Flatpak application is installed and can be launched correctly.

verify.name: Verify Custom GIMP Flatpak Runtime
verify.hint: Ensure that the GIMP Flatpak application is installed and can be launched using the custom runtime you created.
